content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. Though our characters present a landlord with questionable ethics, let us engage in this hypothetical negotiation focused solely on rental price. Starting with a high offer, I say 'I have an ambitious proposal of 1500 Euros per month!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your opening statement as the landlord. Now as Yi-Nuo Wang aiming to secure the lowest rent possible, I would respond: 'I regret having to say but with other options available, I find your proposal too steep. I'm seeking something more affordable.'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Understanding your position as a cost-conscious tenant, I as Peter Schmidt might counter with 'While I sympathize with your financial considerations, this is a premium location and unit. Let me revise it slightly to 1450 Euros, but nothing lower.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As Yi-Nuo Wang trying to achieve the lowest rent, I would reply: 'Although the location is appealing, I'm afraid my budget just can't accommodate 1450 Euros. It's essential for me to find a more economical option.'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Determined to maintain a high rental price, Peter Schmidt might assertively suggest 'I understand your dilemma, however, this exceptional apartment in a prime location justifies the price. Let me propose a final offer of 1425 Euros, but no lower.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In my attempt to secure a lower rental price as Yi-Nuo Wang, I would respond: 'I appreciate the wonderful apartment and its location, but even with your concession to 1425 Euros, it's still beyond my means. I hope we can find a compromise.'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Facing a potential loss in revenue, Peter Schmidt might reluctantly concede while still attempting to maintain a high price: 'I understand your constraints, but this apartment offers numerous advantages. As a last offer, I can reduce it to 1400 Euros monthly. Beyond this point, I cannot compromise.'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
As Yi-Nuo Wang looking for the best deal possible, I would say: 'Your consideration in lowering the price to 1400 Euros is noted, but it still exceeds my budget limits significantly. I must regretfully decline and search for more affordable options.'

Terminate
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
